Package boundaries

Class DoctorApp

java.lang.Object
boundaries.DoctorApp
public class DoctorApp extends Object
Represents the Doctor Application, which allows doctors to manage their appointments, patient medical records, availability slots, and other functionalities within the Hospital Management System.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    DoctorApp(Doctor doctor)
    Constructs a DoctorApp instance for the specified doctor.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    acceptOrDeclineAppointment()
    Allows the doctor to accept or decline pending appointment requests.
    void
    recordAppointmentOutcome()
    Records the outcome of a completed appointment.
    void
    run()
    Starts the Doctor application, allowing the doctor to interact with various features.
